data.name: phone number decryption
data.description:
I have made a simple encryption for phone numbers.

so in this kata we want to make a simple decryption to get the phone number again.

the encryption based on this array:
var arr=["ACD","LFC","BAR","UMP","VET","JUV","FTB","KLS","ING","HOF"];

when arr[0]=ACD means the number 0, arr[1]=LFC means 1 and so on.
what you should do is to write a function that takes a string of encryption phone number
and return the phone number as a string with format.
for example:
StringToNumber("ACDLFCBARUMPVETJUVFTBKLSINGHOF")
should return "012-3456789".
* if the number is not 10 digit you should return "Error"
* the string may contain another characters so you need to avoid that
for example if we take the same example above and add another characters like this
StringToNumber("ACDfkhslLFCdsgsfgBARfgfdUMPfhdghVETdfgdfJUVfddfFTBKLSINGHOF")
it should return the same number.
